flawed_nl_solution:
There are 10000m^2 in each hectare, so 3 hectares contains 3*10000 = <<3*10000=300000>>300000m^2 of land
300000m^2 is divided among 8 sons so each son will get 300000/8 = <<300000/8=37500>>37500m^2
In every 37500m^2, there are 37500/750 = <<37500/750=50>>50 portions of 750m^2 areas of land
Each son can make 50*$500 = $<<50*500=25000>>25000 every 3 months from cultivating their share
In one year there are 12 months so each son can make $25000 up to 12/3 = <<12/3=4>>4 times in a year
Each son can make a total of $25000*4 = $<<25000*4=100000>>100000 in a year
#### 100000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30000, not 300000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
